channel.title: Revival-Rs | 2006 Remake | Online
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Revival Rs[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rKYFqyW.pngf[/img]
[B][URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/10737466/Revival-Rs.jar]Client Download[/URL][/B] [b][url=http://www.revival-rs..com]Forums[/url][/b] [b][url=http://revival-rs.com/misc.php?page=webclient]Play-Now[/url][/b]
[B]Xp Rate : x20[/B]
[QUOTE]Hello members of the Rune-Server Community I present to you Revival-Rs I know what you all may be thinking "Look another remake!" but the reason for why we are doing this is that for me and a couple of friends Runescape back in 2006 was the most amazing and fun filled time we'd ever had. I don't expect this to get around 500-1000 players to be honest im doing this to try and relive the past memories that I had.
[B]We will be using the released version of 2006Memorys but fixing many known bugs/glitches/dupes and adding much more complete content. The reason for why we are using such a complete base is because I do not want to spend alot of time on this project and mainly get on to playing it along with many other eager players.[/B][/QUOTE]
Developers
[B]x32/Ahridok [/B]- Ranno [B]Roone [/B]- Jamal
[B]Features[/B]
[ul][*]Perfect Combat [*]Pvp Fully complete [*]Pvn Fully complete [*]X-logging [*]Many Skills working [*]Many minigames [*]All Random Events [*]Pets [*]Treasure Trails [*]Skill Interfaces [*]Nostalgic Feel[/ul]
[center][B]Media[/B]
[QUOTE]The networking has been edited and i tested it out by running 2000 bots they were spamming all in one spot and the server was not lagging alot but it was lagging may be because of my computer so to keep it from disconnecting actual players a cap of 1000 has been set as the players will be doing much more then just spamming.[/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4EgO8.png[/img]
[QUOTE]The sage of lumbridge has been with us for such a long time no remake is complete without him![/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4Ehrx.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Although this image isn't of RR it still shows the pvp aspect of the 2006 era of runescape it was a ton of fun pking alongside your friends and your clan.[/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4Eix7.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Remember the good old trading days before the grand exchange and when players were actually communicating with one another well we're trying to revive those memories.[/QUOTE]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uiTWA.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Runecrafting plays a very important role as it is the number one source of getting magic runes and fast! [/QUOTE] [img]http://i1282.photobucket.com/albums/a526/dylan1496/Untitled.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Random events are a good way to get some items and gain some expierience and they also help stop bots from gold farming[/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4Ejx6.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Are you brave enough to challenge the warriors of Al-Kharid if so take a trip down to the village of the desert![/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4EjER.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ct5c4cj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FUoRe4k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lkN6xGM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nWjPsDV.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4ToPvEZ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/447x92w.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Oo look at all the pretty colors! Yes firelighters are back with all of the colors![/QUOTE] [img]http://puu.sh/4EkcC.png[/img] [/center]
[/CENTER]

item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

Stunninhigh:

I know for a fact that one of them pictures aren’t yours…

Although this image isn't of RR it still shows the pvp aspect of the 2006 era of runescape it was a ton of fun pking alongside your friends and your clan.

Thank you for stating the obvious…

Iam currently waiting for Ranno because he has everything right now and he isn’t responding to me on skype messaged him a ton of times im planning to quit.

item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

It uses a really bad system for global objects. It’s that classic bs where the object (tree stump, empty mining rock, fire, etc) is never gone and going into a new area it tries to render all of them.

item.title: Revival-Rs | 2006 Remake | Online
item.dc:creator: @ranop11 ranop11
item.description:
@ranop11 wrote:

Few updates
1# Added Lesser Demon to the Wizard tower near Draynor
2# Added Canifis City NPC’s
3# Banana-harvesting (picking bananas from trees - Karamja)
4# Added mage bank shop (includes God capes, Staff’s)
5# Added Oziach’s Armour (includes rune platebody [YES FINALLY for you players], and green d’hide body)
6# All slayer shops have been fixed
7# Fixed too high price for green d’hides alch
8# Added Barker’s Haberdashery Shop
9# Mithril seeds has been added
10# Siegfried Erkle Shop has been added to Legends guild (2 floor correct location)
11# Few clue scrolls fixed

Read full topic
